title: The Aftermath
description: So far, living away from home has not gone to plan for poor Mike.His housemates are unkind to him and their favourite hobby is pranking him. He hasn't managed to make any friends and his contact with his family is limited. He is alone.And one day a prank gone horribly wrong...Now, a year later, things start to look up. After bumping into a beautiful activist, Mike sees a new path for his life. One filled with love, travel and freedom.But will this new adventure cost more then Mike had ever imagined?
author: Julien Mbayi
